Name: Arcane Mark:
Description: Inscribes a permanent personal rune (visible or invisible).

Name: Detect Magic:
Description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft. for up to 1 min./level or until concentration ends.

Name: Ghost Sound:
Description: Figment sounds for 1 round/level.

Name: Light:
Description: Object shines like a torch for 10 min./level.

Name: Mage Hand:
Description: 5-pound telekinesis. Lasts until concentration ends.

Name: Prestidigitation:
Description: Performs minor tricks for 1 hour.

Name: Read Magic:
Description: Read scrolls and spellbooks for 10 min./level.

Name: Feather Fall:
Description: Objects or creatures fall slowly for 1 round/level or until landing.

Name: Floating Disk:
Description: Creates 3-ft.-diameter horizontal disk that holds 100 lb./level. Lasts for 1 hour/level.

Name: Mage Armor
Description: Gives subject +4 armor bonus for 1 hour/level.

Name: Magic Missile:
Description: 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile per two levels above 1st (max 5).

Name: Sleep:
Description: Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber for 1 min./level.

Name: Shocking Grasp:
Description: Touch delivers 1d6/level electricity damage (max 5d6).

Name: Acid Arrow:
Description: Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round +1 round/three levels.

Name: Flaming Sphere:
Description: Creates rolling ball of fire, 2d6 damage, lasts 1 round/level.

Name: Invisibility:
Description: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.

Name: Knock:
Description: Opens locked or magically sealed door.

Name: Levitate:
Description: Subject moves up and down at your direction for 1 min./level.

Name: Spider Climb:
Description: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings for 10 min./level.

Name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance:
Description: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

Name: Dispel Magic:
Description: Cancels magical spells and effects.

Name: Fireball:
Description: 1d6 damage per level, 20-ft. radius.

Name: Fly:
Description: Subject flies at speed of 60 ft. for 1 min./level.

Name: Lightning Bolt:
Description: Electricity deals 1d6/level damage.

Name: Vampiric Touch:
Description: Touch deals 1d6/two levels damage; caster gains damage as hp which last for 1 hour.

Name: Animate Dead:
Description: Creates level X2 HD of undead skeletons or zombies.

Name: Arcane Eye:
Description: Invisible floating eye moves 30 ft./round for 1 min./level.

Name: Black Tentacles:
Description: Tentacles grapple all within 20 ft. spread for 1 round/level.

Name: Dimension Door
Description: Teleports you short distance.

Name: Polymorph:
Description: Gives one willing subject a new form for 1 min./level.

Name: Stoneskin:
Description: Ignore 10 points of damage per attack. Lasts for 10 min./level or until discharged.

Name: Cloudkill:
Description: Kills 3 HD or less; 4-6 HD save or die, 6+ HD take STR damage. Lasts for 1 min./level.

Name: Contact Other Plane:
Description: Lets you ask one question of extraplanar entity. Lasts until concentration ends.

Name: Feeblemind:
Description: Subject’s MIND score drops to 1.

Name: Passwall:
Description: Creates passage through wood or stone wall for 1 hour/level.

Name: Permanency:
Description: Makes certain spells permanent.

Name: Teleport:
Description: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles/level.

Name: Antimagic Field:
Description: Negates magic within 10 ft. for 10 min./level.

Name: Chain Lightning:
Description: 1d6/level damage; 1 secondary bolt/level each deals half damage.

Name: Contingency:
Description: Sets trigger condition for another spell. Lasts for 1 day/level or until discharged.

Name: Disintegrate:
Description: Destroys one creature or object.

Name: Geas:
Description: Commands any creature, binding it to a specific task. Lasts for 1 day/level or until discharged.

Name: True Seeing:
Description: Lets you see all things as they really are for 1 min./level.

Name: Delayed Blast Fireball:
Description: 1d6/level fire damage; you can postpone blast for 5 rounds.

Name: Ethereal Jaunt:
Description: You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

Name: Finger of Death:
Description: Kills one subject.

Name: Plane Shift:
Description: As many as eight subjects travel to another plane.

Name: Power Word Blind:
Description: Blinds creature with 200 hp or less for 1d4+1 minutes (permanent if creature has less than 50 hp).

Name: Spell Turning:
Description: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster for 10 min./level or until expended.

Name: Clone:
Description: Duplicate awakens when original dies.

Name: Horrid Wilting:
Description: Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

Name: Incendiary Cloud:
Description: Cloud deals 4d6 fire damage/round for 1 round/level.

Name: Irresistible Dance:
Description: Forces subject to dance for 1d4+1 rounds.

Name: Power Word Stun:
Description: Stuns creature with 150 hp or less for 2d4 rounds.

Name: Trap the Soul:
Description: Imprisons subject within gem.

Name: Astral Projection:
Description: Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.

Name: Etherealness:
Description: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions for 1 min./level.

Name: Gate:
Description: Connects two planes for travel or summoning. Open for 1 round/level.

Name: Meteor Swarm:
Description: Four exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire damage.

Name: Power Word Kill:
Description: Kills one creature with 100 hp or less.

Name: Soul Bind:
Description: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

Name: Create Water
Description: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.

Name: Guidance:
Description: Grants +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check. Lasts for 1 min. or until discharged.

Name: Light:
Description: Object shines like a torch for 10 min./level.

Name: Purify Food and Drink:
Description: Purifies 1 cu. ft./level of food or water.

Name: Resistance:
Description: Subject gains +1 on saving throws for 1 minute.

Name: Virtue:
Description: Subject gains 1 temporary hp for 1 minute.

Name: Bless:
Description: Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and communication + MIND checks against fear for 1 min./level.

Name: Bless Water
Description: Makes holy water.

Name: Cure Light Wounds:
Description: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).

Name: Divine Favor
Description: You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls for 1 minute.

Name: Magic Stone:
Description: Three stones gain +1 on attack, deal 1d6 +1 damage. Lasts for 30 minutes or until discharged.

Name: Shield of Faith:
Description: Aura grants +2 or higher AC bonus for 1 min./level.

Name: Aid:
Description: Grants +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max +10).

Name: Cure Moderate Wounds:
Description: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level (max +10).

Name: Delay Poison:
Description: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 ?

Name: Gentle Repose:
Description: Preserves one corpse.

Name: Remove Paralysis:
Description: Frees one or more creatures from paralysis or slow effect.

Name: Restoration, Lesser
Description: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

Name: Create Food and Water
Description: Feeds three humans (or one horse)/level.

Name: Cure Serious Wounds:
Description: Cures 3d8 damage +1/level (max +15).

Name: Prayer
Description: Allies get a +1 bonus on most rolls, enemies take a –1 penalty for 1 round/level.

Name: Remove Disease:
Description: Cures all diseases affecting subject.

Name: Searing Light:
Description: Ray deals 1d8/two levels damage, or 1d8/level against undead.

Name: Speak with Dead:
Description: Corpse answers one question/two levels. Lasts for 1 min./level.

Name: Cure Critical Wounds:
Description: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +20).

Name: Discern Lies:
Description: Reveals deliberate falsehoods for 1 round/level or until concentration ends.

Name: Freedom of Movement:
Description: Subject moves normally despite impediments for 10 min./level.

Name: Neutralize Poison:
Description: Immunizes subject against poison for 10 min./level, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

Name: Restoration:
Description: Restores level and ability score drains.

Name: Tongues:
Description: Speak any language for 10 min./level.

Name: Atonement:
Description: Removes burden of misdeeds from subject.

Name: Commune:
Description: Deity answers one yes-or-no question/level. Lasts for 1 round/level.

Name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass:
Description: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.

Name: Flame Strike:
Description: Smite foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

Name: Raise Dead:
Description: Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.

Name: True Seeing:
Description: Lets you see all things as they really are for 1 min./level.

Name: Banishment:
Description: Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

Name: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass:
Description: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.

Name: Harm:
Description: Deals 10 points/level damage to target.

Name: Heal:
Description: Cures 10 points/level of damage, all diseases and mental conditions.

Name: Heroes’ Feast:
Description: Food for one creature/level cures disease and grants +1 combat bonus for 12 hours. Lasts for 1 hour.

Name: Quest:
Description: Commands any creature, binding it to a specific task.

Name: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass:
Description: Cures 3d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.

Name: Destruction:
Description: Kills subject and destroys remains.

Name: Ethereal Jaunt:
Description: You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

Name: Regenerate:
Description: Subject’s severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

Name: Restoration, Greater
Description: As restoration, plus restores all levels and ability scores.

Name: Resurrection:
Description: Fully restores a dead subject from a small portion of the corpse.

Name: Antimagic Field:
Description: Negates magic within 10 ft. for 10 min./level.

Name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass:
Description: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.

Name: Dimensional Lock:
Description: Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.

Name: Discern Location:
Description: Reveals exact loc of creat or object.

Name: Fire Storm:
Description: Deals 1d6/level fire damage.

Name: Holy Aura:
Description: Grants +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against evil spells for 1 round/level.

Name: Astral Projection:
Description: Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.

Name: Etherealness:
Description: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions for 1 min./level.

Name: Gate:
Description: Connects two planes for travel or summoning. Open for 1 round/level.

Name: Heal, Mass:
Description: As heal, but with several subjects.

Name: Implosion:
Description: Kills one creature/round for 4 rounds or until concentration ends.

Name: Soul Bind:
Description: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.
